creator: Harris & Ewing
medium: 1 negative : glass ; 4 x 5 in. or smaller
title: Freshman Senator learns from old timer. Washington, D.C., April 14. During a lull at the meeting of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee yesterday, California's Hiram Johnson took time to answer a few Questions on Senatorial procedure put to him by Florida's new Senator, Claude Pepper. Or maybe they are patching up the long standing Florida-California feud over weather and climate, 4-14-39
